title: Friday Fun: Ask You, Ask me
body:
Happy Friday! Let's have some fun. 

Ask any question you want (no guarantee you'll get the answer you're looking for but you'll get a response). **However In return ** you'll have to answer a question too! 

[Send them in!](https://twitter.com/jpshub/status/500333080012288000)

replies.body: If you could see Phreak dance to any song in the world, what song would it be? (links are appreciated ^^)

Oh ho ho.  This is a *great* question. 

[Choice #1 ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQw4w9WgXcQ)(Totally serious)
[Choice #2 ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rog8ou-ZepE)
[Choice #3](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=otCpCn0l4Wo)

Question for you: What would **YOU** pick for Phreak to dance to?
Don't screw this up, guys...

Definitely this one https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d-diB65scQU

"Dont worry, be happy!"

EDIT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iq_d8VSM0nw FORGOT ABOUT THIS ONE!!!!!

EDIT 2: lol forgot a question hmm... If you could choose any riot employee to dance to one of your songs, which one would you choose? (point out which song you would choose)

EDIT 3: dam im doing a lot of editing. I guess friday is over so im not getting an answer{{item:3073}}
My vote: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4m1EFMoRFvY
one question here, when can we get a new Skarner skin?

I don't know. But you can have this awesome [Skarner origami](http://www.deviantart.com/art/Origami-Skarner-264723000). 

Credit to Frecmenta

Edit: Forgot your question. What would you do for a Klondike bar?
pay for it, then pay again to get another ;3
A bit more of a serious question, but any news regarding Lux's next skin?

I hope there is a Lux skin man, that would be bomb. I have no answers for you there though. 

If you could have any Lux skin made what would you pick?

Fair enough.

I would love to have something like a Sailor Moon Lux skin.

Less serious question: Does anyone at Riot play Ingress?

I want Sailor Moon Diana! Especially after this fanart by [justduet](http://justduet.tumblr.com):

http://38.media.tumblr.com/220d62f531b41b96c85edb168880f863/tumblr_n8xxsvaRY11qh1x6ko1_500.png

Sailor Moon Lux is prob the best idea I've ever heard. 

I don't personally but I'll check it out.

Just so that you know, Ingress is a GPS based mobile game by Niantic Labs, operating inside of Google.

Various pieces of public artwork and other unique landmarks are represented as portals in the game, and players have to travel to the portals in order to capture them for their faction, either Enlightened or Resistance, and link them together to create control fields, earning mind units for their faction. It's kind of a "King of the Hill" style game.

Also, the story is still unfolding on Google+.
There is *totally* not an underground low-level Enlightened (QA) movement starting a zerg war vs the resident max-level Resistance (IT).
If you could give up sleep (And in turn never need to sleep again, and never could sleep again) would you?

Definitely. The amount of time gained from not sleeping is equivalent to quite a few years of life. Think of all the new skills you could learn, all the places you could go! 

If you could only live one place the rest of your life, where would it be?

Now for an opposite question, if you had the choice between hitting your foot on a piano everytimes you come in at the job or having to sleep 1 hour more per day, how many solutions would you find for that piano during the 1 additional hour of sleep?

Just 1.  Steel toe boots.   

*hits snooze*.

Hawaii - on the big island.  I went for a vacation there a few years ago and considered never leaving. 
Great coffee, amazing fruit, nice people, sunshine, rain, ocean...I can't think of a reason not to live there.
What game would you play if you were looking to replace League of Legends in your gaming rotation?

Destiny. I've been avoiding getting into because I'm afraid the addiction level will be high. 

If you had to choose between a dark, unexplored cave or an abandoned mental hospital to spend the night in what would you pick?
What is the air speed velocity of an unladen swallow?

it's really a [simple question of weight ratios.](http://style.org/unladenswallow/). Also Monty Python reference ftw. 

Your question: What song would you dance to if no one was watching?
The more important question is what song wouldn't I dance to if now one was watching.
I like your style. I get caught dancing in the elevator at Rito HQ all the time.
Of a 52 card deck with 4 Aces, what is the probability of drawing an Ace after removing 5 cards at random from the deck and placing those 5 cards facedown and  away.

Math is hard. Maybe like 8% chance? 

Question: What is your least favorite LoL champion?

Well that's a little vague, but sure, let's go with that (^ ^).

Urgot. He just feels so incomplete and clunky to play as, it hurts sometimes.

What do you think is the biggest difference between your favorite champion and your least favorite champion?

ANNNND IN THIS CORNER, weighing in at an unimpressive 25 lbs but don't under-estimate him folks — the tiny terror, the prehistoric wonder, so cute he'll break your face and then crunch your bones... GNAR!!

And his challenger APPROACHES. We don't know his weight because he'll never give us a straight answer — the prince of puns, the why-so-serious then stabs you in the back, the Demon Jester himself.... SHACO!!

{{champion:150}} vs. {{champion:35}} 

Gnar is cutest thing ever and Shaco is really creepy.

Exactly the same as if the cards were face up and magnified, since their value doesn't change. At that point, the question is what are the chances of an Ace being in 6th position in the deck, so it's the same as the probability of drawing an ace in a 52-cards shuffled deck or 1/14.

Now, let's raise the bar, what's the chance 7th cards' value will be greater than the 6th's and the 6th's higher than the 5th's (using the mathematical sense of greater, so "greater or equal")?
NOOO MATH BADDD
Serious Question: Yams or Potatoes?

Yams. I didn't know there was such a thing as a Potato Jesus. I was trying to think of a good resurrection joke but I didn't know where to starch. 

Question for you: What is a word you think sounds really weird?
definatley kakorrhaphiophobia , which means a fear of failure. I don't think I even spelt that right.

It strikes me funny that the word that means "fear of failure" pretty much guarantees failure when you have to spell it.

Insidious.
That next level spelling bee term.
Here's one a friend of mine came up with: You get a million dollars, but everytime you want to spend it, it's all in coins that you have to physically pull out of your ear. Would you do it?

Haha this one had me thinking for a LONG time. I'd say no, although if it was $1 coins it might be manageable to pay for some things like getting coffee or grabbing lunch. 

Question for you: What is one of your favorite musicians and why?

We Canadians have 1 dollar coins called Loonies ,2$ coins called "Toonies" (I kid you not).  There was talk of making a 5$ coin as well...no word on what we would have called it.  It would make this million dollar aural problem a lot less annoying, and really quite convenient in some cases.  

/eh

Individual musicians? Uh.... Sona? lol jk, Benny Greb, because he's drum-Jesus.

Can we keep trading questions back and forth?

Thanks for the response!
Sure, you can ask another.

You didn't ask another question back D:

Serious question though, does the view count for the boards count unique views or just every time someone clicks on the thread? Thanks

Oh my bad. For the view count I believe it is uniques, but I'll confirm with the devs. 

Question for you: If you could have a plushie of any champion who would you want?

Dino Gnar of course!

If you could have any champion as your best friend/waifu, who would it be and why?

{{champion:236}}! The guy is a badass.

Edit: Adding question — What's the worst TV show you've ever seen?

I feel like I've erased any specifics from my memory; probably any of the recent (or any, really) reality television shows I've seen. I don't watch much television anymore, largely because I don't like anything that's on (and the shows I do want to watch, I can find on Hulu or something. Currently watching Inuyasha again)

What is the most awkward movie experience you've had?

Ha, luckily I've survived most movies without truly awkward experiences. However, a couple weeks ago a ceiling panel fell down into the audience during the movie. Scared the crap out of me. 

Question for you: What's the worst pickup line you've heard?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lUJ24mblCLY

Can't say I remember any pick-up lines, but these are pretty great :P

Hope everyone was alright

Excluding League of Legends, what is the fictional universe that you would most want to be a part of/live in, and what role/powers would you have in it?
